name: Troll
description: Trolls stand over 10 feet tall with long limbs and green, warty skin, making them look menacing.
memorable: The troll's regenerative abilities allow it to recover from severe injuries, making it a formidable opponent.
goals: Trolls hunt anything they can overpower, preying on the weak.
relations: Trolls may be encountered alongside other savage predators in caves, swamps, and forests.
environment: Caves, swamps, and forests where they can hunt and hide.
strengths: Exceptional Constitution and the ability to regenerate lost hit points at the start of their turn.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to fire and acid damage, which impede their regeneration.
attacks: Multiattack with a bite and claw, allowing them to inflict significant damage in combat.
most_powerful_ability: Regeneration that allows the troll to recover 10 hit points at the start of its turn.
senses: Keen smell provides advantage on Perception checks relying on smell, enhancing tracking capabilities.
skills: Skilled in stealth, allowing them to remain undetected in their environment.
additional_information: Can make attacks even when missing limbs due to Severed Limbs ability.
Ravenous Frenzy allows them to regain hit points when attacking under certain conditions.
Relies on brute strength and cunning tactics despite low intelligence.
Notable for their ferocity in combat.
Effectively uses their long reach in attacks.
